mapper.select: SELECT ue.id, mi.name AS itemName, ue.is_redeemed AS isRedeemed, ue.place_name AS placeName, ue.code, ue.created_at AS createdAt FROM user_exchange ue LEFT JOIN mall_item mi ON ue.item_id = mi.id WHERE ue.user_id = #{userId} AND ue.delflag = 0 AND ue.is_redeemed = #{isRedeemed} ORDER BY ue.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
